commit.message:
gimplify.c (oacc_default_clause): Use inform for enclosing scope.

	gcc/
	* gimplify.c (oacc_default_clause): Use inform for enclosing scope.

	gcc/testsuite/
	* c-c++-common/goacc/data-default-1.c: Correct expected

From-SVN: r230321
